about_the_game:
Personal production of the pixel beautiful girl love raising game. There are three language options: Simplified Chinese, English , Japanese . Lightweight, the story is a science fiction delusion style, right as the author's personal delusion.

About this game.
This is a Date is a romance raising + light combat game. In the game you need to complete the tasks issued by the agency within 100 actions - collect 500,000 points.
You need to develop your five dimensional attributes, which affect your growth, actionable content.

In the game, there are three female protagonists, and getting involved in their actions will help you grow tremendously.
To usher in the exclusive ending of the heroines, you need to complete their events, as well as reach 600,000 points.

Game characters.
You.
You are a nurtured human who is new to the planet. You arrived on this planet already as a cultivator with extensive experience in interstellar pioneering.

Lucy.
Luci is your assistant. The moment you come out of the nurtured bin, you are partners, and she will assist you in various actions.

Lizzy.
She is a more quiet girl, she likes to hang out in libraries, laboratories, contact with her requires a certain amount of rational attributes, in-depth understanding requires a certain amount of knowledge, but to really understand her, also requires a considerable amount of sensibility, not let you can not empathize with her, step into her heart.

Alice.
She is a more lively girl, she likes to hang out in places of entertainment, contact with her requires a certain amount of sensual attributes, in-depth understanding of her requires a certain amount of sensuality, but to really understand her, you need a considerable amount of sensuality, rationality, knowledge.

Cuno.
She is a girl who likes sports, she likes to exercise in the square, contact with her needs the power attribute, want to understand her deeply, naturally, to keep up with her endurance, really understand her, need knowledge and sensibility, otherwise she may not have confidence.
